    • Field Detail

      • HIDE_DROPDOWN_ICON

        public static final Key<java.lang.Boolean> HIDE_DROPDOWN_ICON
        By default button representing popup action group displays 'dropdown' icon. This key allows to avoid 'dropdown' icon painting, just put it in ActionButton's presentation or template presentation of ActionGroup like this: presentation.putClientProperty(ActionButton.HIDE_DROPDOWN_ICON, Boolean.TRUE)

      • myPresentation

        protected final Presentation myPresentation

      • myAction

        protected final AnAction myAction

      • myPlace

      • getIcon

        public javax.swing.Icon getIcon()
        Returns:
        button's icon. Icon depends on action's state and button's state. It means that the method returns disabled icon if action is disabled. In case of rollover (POPPED) or pressed (PUSHED) button's state hovered icon is used (if presented) If the action's icon is null then it returns an empty icon.
